meanings.definition: Most closely connected to or resembling the earth.
meanings.sent1: The soil in the garden felt earthiest after the rain.
meanings.sent2: She loved the earthiest colors like brown and green.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his earthiest outfit made him blend in with the dirt.
meanings.sent4: The earthiest scent of freshly turned soil brought back memories of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The earthiest pottery in the shop had a natural, rustic charm.

meanings.definition: Most practical or down-to-earth in nature.
meanings.sent1: Her earthiest advice was to save money for emergencies.
meanings.sent2: The earthiest solution to the problem was to work together.
meanings.sent3: He had the earthiest approach to fixing things, using simple tools.
meanings.sent4: She had the earthiest way of cutting through complicated issues.
meanings.sent5: The earthiest person in the group always kept things simple and clear.
